NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES REINSURING, MERGING, OR WITHDRAWING FROM NEBRASKA FROM JANUARY 1, 1032, TO JUNE 1, 1033. Aero Indemnity Company, New York, withdrew as of April 30, 1932. Aero Insurance Company, New York, withdrew as of April 30,. 1932. Alliance Casualty Company, Philadelphia, Pa., reinsured by Indemnity Insurance Company of North America, Philadelphia, Pa., June 1, 1933. American Constitution Fire Assurance Company, New York, merged with American Home Fire Assurance Company of New York, October 19, 1933. American National Assurance Company, St. Louis, Mo., withdrew as of April 30, 1933. Baltimore American Insurance Company of New York, withdrew as of December 31, 1932. Bankers Reserve Life Company, Omaha, Nebr., reinsured by Ohio National Life Insurance Company, Cincinnati, Ohio, April 13, 1933. Central Life Association, Lincoln, Nebraska, reinsured in American States Life Insurance Company of Lincoln, Nebr., in 1932. Central West Casualty Company, -Detroit, Mich., -withdrew as of April 30, 1933. Commerce Casualty Company, Glens Falls. New York, merged with Glens Falls Indemnity Company, of Glens Falls, N. Y., June 28, 1932. Constitution Indemnity Company of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, Pa., Merged with Detroit Fidelity and Surety Company, of Philadelphia, and Lloyds Casualty Company and changed name to Lloyds Insur - ance Company of America, October 28, 1932. Continental National Life Insurance Company, Denver, Colorado, con - solidated with the Great American Life Insurance Company of San Antonio, Texas, July 21, 1932. Detroit Fidelity and Surety Company, Detroit, Mich., merged with Constitution Indemnity Company of Philadelphia and Lloyds Casualty Company and changed, name to Lloyds Insurance Com - pany of America, October 28, 1932. Dixie Fire Insurance Company, Greensboro, North Carolina, withdrew as of April 30, 1931. Eagle Fire Insurance Company of New York, New York, withdrew as of April 31, 1933. Equity Life Insurance Company, Omaha, Nebr., reinsured by Union Pacific Assurance Co. of America, Omaha, September 15, 1932. Export Indemnity Company, New York, N. Y., withdrew as of April 20, 1932. Farmers Mutual Tornado Fire and Live Stock Ins. Co. of Cass County, Plattsmouth, Nebr., reinsured by Farmers Mutual Insurance Com - pany of Nebraska, Lincoln, Nebr., January 9, 1932. Guaranty Fire Insurance Company of Providence, Providence, R. I., merged with the Merchants Fire Ins., Company of Providence, R. I.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT New Jersey Fidelity and Plate Glass Co., reinsured by Commercial Casualty Insurance Co., Newark, N. J., May 20, 1932. Old Line Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nebr.. reinsured by Lincoln Na - tional Life Insurance Co., Fort Wayne, Ind., as of March 7, 1933, excepting a small amount of automobile accident business. Register Life Insurance Co., Davenport, Iowa, withdrew as of March 8, 1933. Reinsurance Company of Salamandra, Copenhagen, Denmark, with - drew as of April 30, 1932. Co. of Nebraska, Lincoln, Nebr... June 8, 1932. Seaboard Surety Company, New York, N. Y., withdrew aB of April 30, 1933. Skandia Insurance Company, Stockholm, Sweden, withdrew as of Dec. 31, 1932. Transportation Indemnity Company, New York, 'N. Y., merged with Consolidated Indemnity and Insurance Co., of New York, June, 1932. Y., merged with Westchester Fire Ins. Co., July 15, 1932. Universal Casualty Underwriters, Kansas City, Mo., reinsured in Utili - ties Insurance Company, St. Louis, Mo., December 31, 1932.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES CHANGING NAME OR PliAN Acacia Mutual Life Association, Washington, D. C, changed name to Acacia Mutual Life Insurance Company, May 14, 1932. American Indemnity Life Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nehr., changed name to Guardian National Life Insurance Company, January 10, 1933. Brotherhood of American Yeomen, Des Molnes, Iowa, transformed to a mutual legal reserve life insurance company and changed name to Yeomen Mutual Life Insurance Company, January 14, 1932. Citizens Benefit Burial Insurance Company, Omaha, Nebraska, changed name to Citizens Limited Life Insurance Company, November 28, 1932. Fidelity Old Line Insurance Company, Omaha, Nebr., changed plan to burial. May 31, 1932. Great Western Hail Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nebr., changed plan to write fire, and name to Great Western Fire Insurance Company, June 1st, 1933. National Accident Insurance Company, Lincoln, Nebr., changed name to National Assurance Corporation, January 26, 1933. Nebidaka Insurance Company, Omaha, Nebr., changed name to Miss - ouri Valley National Insurance Company, May 26, 1933. Plate Glass Reciprocal Underwriters, Kansas City, Mo., changed name to Allied Underwriters, March 1, 1932. Utilities Indemnity Exchange, St. Louis, Mo., reorganized as a stock casualty company and changed name to Utilities Insurance Com - pany January 20, 1932. Western Grain Dealers Mutual Fire Insurance Company, Des Moines, la., changed name to Western Mutual Fire Insurance Company, January 17, 1932. Western Reciprocal Underwriters, Kansas City; Mo., changed plan to mutual fire and name to Western Underwriters Mutual Insurance Company, March 18, 1932.
